topic.title: Can't mail echobot
topic.body: When trying to ZeroMail echobot, it doesn't find the username.

topic.title: ZeroName hangs tab
topic.body: Is it just me or does ZeroName hang the tab it's on and you have to open ZeroNet in a new tab to do anything?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
Got a error from it:

Internal error: KeyError: 'content.json'

UiWebsocket.py line 81 > UiWebsocket.py line 265 > SidebarPlugin.py line 531 > SidebarPlugin.py line 121 > ContentDbDict.py line 59

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Can't download last 3 updates on ZeroTalk
